text: Johan Price-Pejtersen (born 26 May 1999) is a Danish cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . ==Major results== ;2016 : 1st 20px Team pursuit, National Track Championships ;2017 : UCI Junior Track World Championships ::1st 20px Individual pursuit ::2nd 15px Team pursuit ;2018 : 1st Stage 5b (ITT) Olympia's Tour : 3rd Hafjell GP ;2019 : 1st 20px Time trial, UEC European Under-23 Road Championships : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships : 2nd Hafjell GP : 3rd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2020 : 2nd Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male cyclists
title: Johan Price-Pejtersen
